page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT-LOCALS-COMMUTERS
page.content: {THERE IS NO UNEMPLOYMENT IN THIS AREA {DUE TO GOOD JOB POTENTIAL.}EMPLOYMENT SOURCES IN THE AREA FOR INDIGENOUS AND MIGRANT PEOPLE ARE:{BROCKHAM PARK LABS {(RESEARCH),SCHOOLS,FARMING,BUILDING, {NURSING,HORTICULTURE,MILLING,PUBLIC {HOUSES,STABLES,LIVERY,FISHING-FOWLING, {CATTERIES,KENNELS,METALS;}MANY TRADES AND PROFESSIONS ARE CATERED FOR. {SOME INDIGENOUS AND MANY MIGRANTS {ARE COMMUTERS TO THE NEARBY TOWNS AND {CITIES.}SOME MIGRANTS ARE NATIONALLY OR INTERNATIONALLY EMPLOYED.{MIGRANTS {COME TO THE AREA,JOBS ASSURED,FOR THE {BEAUTIFUL COTTAGES AND CONVERTED FARM {HOUSES CLOSE TO MOTORWAYS AND AIRPORTS DEPENDANTS FIND LOCAL JOBS OR COMMUTE. THERE ARE A NUMBER ,SOME RETIRED, WHO TAKE INTEREST IN PRESERVATION AND CON- SERVATION;{NATIONAL BARN COUNT AND {DOMESTIC BUILDINGS RESEARCH GROUP. THE {KINGSTON RECORDS OFFICE/LIBRARIES USED
